data.lyric:
[ti:Side Effects]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/Emily Warren]
[al:Sick Boy...Side Effects]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Side Effects - The Chainsmokers/Emily Warren
[00:01.34]Lyricist：Emily Warren/Andrew Taggart/Dong An/Sylvester Willy Sivertsen/Corey Sanders
[00:02.68]Composer：Emily Warren/Andrew Taggart/Dong An/Sylvester Willy Sivertsen/Corey Sanders
[00:04.02]It's 4AM I don't know where to go
[00:07.60]Everywhere is closed I should just go home yeah
[00:12.69]My feet are taking me to your front door
[00:16.03]I know I shouldn't though heaven only knows that
[00:21.14]Ooh the side effect to my loneliness is you
[00:30.04]Ooh you're all that I want
[00:32.34]No good at giving you up
[00:34.58]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[00:38.55]Ooh you're all that I want
[00:41.17]No good at giving you up
[00:43.22]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[00:47.61]This happens every time I try to mix
[00:51.01]Decision making with one too many drinks but
[00:55.98]Ooh if late night friends have consequences cool yeah
[01:04.89]Ooh you're all that I want
[01:07.33]No good at giving you up
[01:09.37]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[01:13.37]Ooh you're all that I want
[01:16.03]No good at giving you up
[01:18.13]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[01:22.23]Ooh I think about it all the time
[01:25.96]Make it up in my mind I'm telling you yeah
[01:31.01]Ooh you're all that I want
[01:33.38]No good at giving you up
[01:35.49]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[01:39.60]Time should've taught me the lesson
[01:41.28]When looking for a sign but instead I got a message
[01:43.44]I take off my pride every time we undressing
[01:45.96]Draw the line I'm out of line yeah
[01:48.25]Time should've taught me the lesson
[01:50.00]When looking for a sign but instead I got a message
[01:52.11]I take off my pride every time we undressing
[01:54.64]Draw the line I'm out of line
[01:57.24]Ooh you're all that I want
[01:59.61]No good at giving you up
[02:01.66]C'mon and gimme some love tonight yeah
[02:05.91]Ooh you're all that I want
[02:08.35]No good at giving you up
[02:10.43]C'mon and gimme some love tonight yeah
[02:14.67]I I think about it all the time
[02:18.28]Make it up in my mind I'm telling you yeah
[02:23.31]Ooh you're all that I want
[02:25.78]No good at giving you up
[02:27.85]C'mon and gimme some love tonight
[02:31.98]Time should've taught me the lesson
[02:33.59]When looking for a sign but instead I got a message
[02:35.81]I take off my pride every time we undressing
[02:38.22]Draw the line I'm out of line yeah
[02:40.84]Time should've taught me the lesson
[02:42.35]When looking for a sign but instead I got a message
[02:44.45]I take off my pride every time we undressing
[02:46.87]Draw the line I'm out of line yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Side Effects]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/Emily Warren]
[al:Sick Boy...Side Effects]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.34]//
[00:02.68]//
[00:04.02]现在是凌晨四点 我不知该去哪儿
[00:07.60]到处都关了门 我应该回家了
[00:12.69]我的双脚不听使唤 走到你家门口
[00:16.03]我知道不该这样 但上天可鉴
[00:21.14]我因你而寂寞
[00:30.04]你就是我所求
[00:32.34]放弃你我做不到
[00:34.58]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[00:38.55]你就是我所求
[00:41.17]放弃你我做不到
[00:43.22]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[00:47.61]这种情况经常发生 我想解决
[00:51.01]每一次喝的酩酊大醉之后 都会下定决心
[00:55.98]深夜 朋友们能来一场艳遇
[01:04.89]但你就是我所求
[01:07.33]放弃你我做不到
[01:09.37]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[01:13.37]你就是我所求
[01:16.03]放弃你我做不到
[01:18.13]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[01:22.23]我想只是时间问题
[01:25.96]我告诉你 我的心正在慢慢愈合
[01:31.01]你就是我所求
[01:33.38]放弃你我做不到
[01:35.49]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[01:39.60]时间已经让我吸取教训
[01:41.28]我在寻找某种讯号 却接收到一条信息
[01:43.44]每一次你我赤诚相待 我都如同卸下尊严
[01:45.96]我划下界限 如今我已越界
[01:48.25]时间已经让我吸取教训
[01:50.00]我在寻找某种讯号 却接收到一条信息
[01:52.11]每一次你我赤诚相待 我都如同卸下尊严
[01:54.64]我划下界限 如今我却位于危险边缘
[01:57.24]你就是我所求
[01:59.61]放弃你我做不到
[02:01.66]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[02:05.91]你就是我所求
[02:08.35]放弃你我做不到
[02:10.43]今夜 给我一点爱情吧
[02:14.67]我一直在思考
[02:18.28]我告诉你 我的心正在慢慢愈合
